attributes.action: Stop the reopening of the alleyway on Woodland Drive/Cassiobury Drive to allow access to the Proposed Free School in Watford
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to object about the proposal for opening of the Free School in Hempstead Road, Watford in particular the proposal of repopening the alleyway on Woodland drive to the College.

· The proposal to open the alleyway into Cassiobury estate to allow children to be dropped off and collected from school is yet another example of the council wanting to find a quick fix to the problem of no workable drop off and pick up point for the children due to this site being unsuitable for purpose.
